span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;
    color: #c00100;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.pkg-exc ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 7px 0 7px 30px;

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Switzerland Paris Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/holidays-in-switzerland" title="Switzerland Tour Packages">Switzerland</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Switzerland Paris Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c37cf144e62_30689509" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/paris-switzerland.jpg" alt="Switzerland Paris Tour Package" title="Switzerland Paris Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>This is the ultimate vacation holiday package if you are looking to get away from the general tourist places. A tour of Paris and Switzerland will allow you to have one of the most Soul rejuvenating experiences with your family. From the rolling green hills to visiting the Eiffel tower in Paris everywhere you go, you will be able to have a look at some of the most spectacular and stunning panoramic sights. Book online your Switzerland and Paris tour for a complete holiday.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Switzerland Paris Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Paris</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>On reaching the romantic capital of the world – Paris you will be received and greeted by our tour representative who will guide you to your allotted hotel here where you will be staying the night. By late evening you will be able to enjoy a fun and memorable Lido show or a walk on the gravel roads here, just like in the movies.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Sightseeing Tour of Paris</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having a delicious breakfast in the morning you will be taken on a complete sightseeing tour of Paris where you will be covering some of the most iconic landmarks here. these places include – Notre Dame Cathedral, Place De La Concorde, the Avenue Des Champs and Arc De Triomphe. This will take up your whole day but before heading back to your hotel you will be taken to Eiffel tower which looks even prettier at night when it is all lighted up. You will even be taken on a fun cruising for river Seine which will enable you to experience the thumping city of the Paris from its bank.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Disneyland Paris</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>The Swiss and a Parisian tour package will take you to your next destination of Disneyland here which is a unique experience in itself. You will be made to explore this incredible park after having your breakfast in the morning. For the whole day you will be indulging in various amazing and thrilling rides, water parks etc. after spending your whole day here you will be taken back to your hotel here in Paris where you will be staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Paris – Interlaken</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be assisted to the Paris railway station where you will be made to board the train heading for Interlaken. This will be a very scenic journey of 6.5 hours. Via Basel. On arriving at Interlaken our tour representative will receive you and get you checked in to your hotel here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Interlaken – Mt. Jungfraujoch – Interlaken</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to visit the famous excursion destination in Switzerland of Mt. Jungfraujoch which is the highest point in entire Europe. Your tour of Switzerland remains incomplete without your visit here. After exploring and taking pictures and creating memories here you will be made to head back to your hotel at Interlaken where you will be staying for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Interlaken – Lucerne</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be assisted to Interlaken station where you will be boarding the train headed for Lucerne. On reaching there you will be assisted by our tour manager to your hotel in Lucerne where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Lucerne – Mt Titlis – Lucerne</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to transfer to your next destination of sightseeing to Mt Titlis which is located at a mere distance of just 1 hour. This is the prime attraction of any Switzerland and Paris holiday package. You will be betting a panoramic view of the grand majestic peaks of Alps. You will also be made to have some fun and adrenaline-pumping activities here before heading back to your hotel in the evening back in Lucerne by evening.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Lucerne – Zurich</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to check out of your hotel in Lucerne and made to proceed to the railway station here where you will be boarding the train heading for Zurich. This will be a stunning and breath-taking journey through the Alps and lush green meadows of about an hour. You will then be taken to your hotel here where you will be checked in with the help of our tour representative. By afternoon you will be taken on a fun and enjoyable Zurich Trolley tour. By evening you will be taken to some of the most amazing places here like – museums and shopping avenues.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Zurich Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be taken to your departure location after getting checked out of the hotel in Zurich. Your tour of Paris and Switzerland will come to an end once you are made to board the flight heading for your desired destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Switzerland Paris Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Most Efficient Way To Get From Switzerland To Paris?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The best way to travel from Switzerland to Paris is by train, which takes 5 hours and 7 minutes and costs between SFr 180 and SFr 340. You can also take the bus, which costs SFr 60 - SFr 90 and takes 10h 50m, or fly, which costs SFr 90 - SFr 240 and takes 4h 12m.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Should You Go To Paris And Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Switzerland is best visited between April and October, though winter sports enthusiasts may prefer December to March. The country is divided into four distinct seasons, each with its own set of attractions.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Cheapest Month To Visit Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> July and August are considered high season. February is the cheapest month to fly to Switzerland.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Paris Food Culture Like?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Food in Paris is as diverse and varied as the people who live there, so while some recipes call for a splash of wine, others are alcohol-free. Gourmets, on the other hand, will adore the great classics that rely on wine for robustness and flavour, such as coq au vin, boeuf bourguignon, and frog legs.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
